item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Google’s OAuth login doesn’t protect against purchasing a failed startup domain (205 points | 115 comments)
2. Apple will soon receive 'made in America' chips from TSMC's Arizona fab (175 points | 87 comments)
3. Dbt Labs acquires SDF Labs (49 points | 25 comments)
4. Reversible computing escapes the lab (138 points | 29 comments)
5. Servo vs. steppers: Speed, Torque and Accuracy [video] (54 points | 13 comments)
6. Ask HN: Teams using AI – how do you prevent it from breaking your codebase? (17 points | 16 comments)
7. 1 in 5 online job postings are either fake or never filled, study finds (277 points | 226 comments)
8. Data evolution with set-theoretic types (28 points | 1 comment)
9. Executive order on advancing United States leadership in AI infrastructure (30 points | 11 comments)
10. The Shepherd 1.0.0 released (65 points | 12 comments)
11. Carnarvon's NASA satellite dish receives first signal in almost 40 years (71 points | 15 comments)
12. In the belly of the MrBeast (374 points | 262 comments)
13. The Missing Nvidia GPU Glossary (54 points | 7 comments)
14. Mastodon announces new European non-profit, change of CEO (65 points | 11 comments)
15. Craniometrix (YC W22) is hiring a founding engineer on CTO track ( | hide)
16. Hotel booking sites overcharge Bay Area customers (47 points | 15 comments)
17. LLM based agents as Dungeon Masters (79 points | 85 comments)
18. Software Engineer Pay Heatmap for Europe (18 points | 15 comments)
19. Glicol: Next-generation computer music language (23 points | 3 comments)
20. A couple CSS tricks for HTML Dialog elements (83 points | 20 comments)
21. Cosmos Keyboard: Scan your hand, build a keyboard (40 points | 5 comments)
22. ZFS 2.3 released with ZFS raidz expansion (306 points | 216 comments)
23. Webtop – Alpine,Ubuntu,Fedora,and Arch containers containing full desktop envs (297 points | 57 comments)
24. Stories from the Internet (7 points | 2 comments)
25. Nix – Death by a Thousand Cuts (111 points | 39 comments)
26. Using coding skills to make passive income (170 points | 93 comments)
27. The DevOps Engineer's Handbook (62 points | 1 comment)
28. Ask HN: How do you prevent the impact of social media on your children? (50 points | 29 comments)
29. Shavarsh Karapetyan (170 points | 23 comments)
30. Company of One: Why Staying Small Is the Next Big Thing for Business (34 points | 10 comments)
